ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hods.1 | |- R : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hods.2 | |- S : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 |  | hods.3 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( S +op T ) = ( T +op S ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( R +op ( S +op T ) ) = ( R +op ( T +op S ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_hoaddassi | |- ( ( R +op S ) +op T ) = ( R +op ( S +op T ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_hoaddassi | |- ( ( R +op T ) +op S ) = ( R +op ( T +op S ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- ( ( R +op S ) +op T ) = ( ( R +op T ) +op S ) |
